:py:mod:`pyslam.image_processing.feature_descriptors.descriptors`
=================================================================

.. py:module:: pyslam.image_processing.feature_descriptors.descriptors

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This module defines various types of descriptors
   that we can extract from images.
